message:
انا عايز اعرف موضوع ال end-to-end encryption ده ازاي الناس مقتنعه بيه ومفيش مواقع تقنية عالمية اتكلمت عن ان الواتس اب هي اللي بتـ generate و تنقل الـ encryption key بين اليوزرس.. ما ممكن الواتس اب تخزنه عندها وقتها لأغراض فك التشفير لو احتاجوا.. وماحدش يقدر يثبت العكس...
يبقى ال encryption ده مالوش اي لازمة وممكن يكون وهم خصوصية اتباع للمستخدمين...
او ممكن تكون فيه معلومة ناقصاني ومخلياني افكر بالطريقة دي..

data.message:
في حاجة كده تسع ورقات اسمها whatsapp security team white 
paper 
أنا مكملتهاش بس فيها إجابة كلامك تقريبا
مهو انت علشان تعمل تيست للموضوع عملينلك كود خاص بيك لوحدك جوة الأبلكيشن بتاعك كود الديكربشن :)

The only keys WhatsApp generates are the One-Time PreKeys pairs which is used only once to establish the session when you are taking to someone for the first time, but all other keys are generated by your device, WhatsApp doesn't know anything about them, and each conversation has its own session and message keys.
You can find the details in the white paper and look for Open Whisper Signal protocol which is the underlying protocol used by WhatsApp and other messaging services

Simple  root your device and override certificate pinning and then watch the data stream from your device to Whatsapp servers 

Can you see your private key leaving your  device ? If not then whatsapp e2e encryption is secure

Simply  your WhatsApp  app decrypt the received messages using two type of keys
1-private key located on your app and no one except your app know it 
2-public key is comming with the message header 

using above two keys messages were decrypted .. i worked on a project we used unofficial chat apis to receive and send messages (session) for a dial ... but project stoped as many parojects like that because of this kind of encryption. ... 

how to be sure that WhatsApp doesn't have a copy of your private keys is like the example above about why you are trusting the bank doesn't have a copy of your key ... another technical reason to trust what's app that private keys are generated for every message .. for more info read the technical paper on what'sapp official website

ببساطه ال end to end ال key بيحصله generation علي ال device نفسه وطبعا اللي بيعمله هو ال whatsapp 

وبالتالي مفيش اي حاجة تضمن ان whatsapp مش بيعت ال key نفسه للسيرفر

End to end encryption is only good for having confidentiality, yet Whatsapp still has some issues on the authentication side of things, how do you make sure that you are really talking to right person on the other end, y have to use a QR code or compare a long numeric string in the beginning of any conversation, and then the question is, how do communicate that to the other party and avoid man in the middle watching/monitoring the channel ?
